pr_title: Fail on invalid rest and transport categories

timeline.message: Fail on invalid rest and transport categories

timeline.bodyText:
why these categories are disable at rest layer?
Aren't these all valid categories?
timeline.author: hardik-k-shah

replies.bodyText: This is a validation check. They are valid categories for "disabled_rest_categories" field. Similarly for transport
replies.author: sujithvm
